etymology.description: 菠萝包(菠蘿包) (bōluóbāo, "pineapple bun") is a type of sweet pastry with a crunchy, sugary topping resembling the texture of a pineapple.
etymology.interpretation: The name 菠萝包(菠蘿包) (bōluóbāo) describes a bun (包) with a topping that visually resembles a pineapple (菠萝/菠蘿) due to its pattern and color, even though it contains no pineapple. It is popular in Hong Kong and reflects the creativity of Cantonese bakery culture.

examples.chinese: 他喜欢吃菠萝包(他喜歡吃菠蘿包)。
examples.english: He likes to eat pineapple buns.

examples.chinese: 早上经过面包店(早上經過麵包店)，我买了一个菠萝包(我買了一個菠蘿包)。
examples.pinyin: Zǎoshang jīngguò miànbāodiàn, wǒ mǎile yīgè bōluóbāo.
examples.english: I passed by a bakery in the morning and bought a pineapple bun.
